VESPR is a non-custodial light wallet for the Cardano network, prioritizing the security and safety of your digital assets while ensuring exceptional ease-of-use. Your private keys and assets always remain under your control.

Our highly intuitive interface is designed for all types of users, from experienced investors and Cardano enthusiasts to novice users exploring web3.

VESPR focuses on providing lightning-fast speed and unmatched reliability, allowing you to make transactions anytime, anywhere. Send, store, and receive Cardano native tokens, showcase your NFT collection, connect to dApps, earn passive income, and carry the world of Cardano with you wherever you go.
